summary: Makes the glaze on sweetrolls a chocolate color.
descriptionHtml:
Chocolate Glazed Sweetroll - by THEWULFMAN

Description:
Simple texture mod. Makes the glaze on sweetrolls a chocolate color. I was eating a chocolate glazed donut at 5am and was playing Skyim. Oh wow, a fat geek, what else is new? Anyway, I thought there was a lack of chocolate in Skyrim, so I decided to fix that.

Installation:
Copy the textures folder to your Skyrim\\data folder. 

Uninstallation: 
Delete the sweetroll01.dds file located in Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\Clutter\\ingredients.


Credits
-Bethesda
-THEWULFMAN
author: THEWULFMAN
